This web application processes, combines, and validates student quiz report from [SELECx](http://selecx.si.mahidol.ac.th) (Siriraj E-Learning and Education Community).

The details in Thai languages can be found [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1F4Sbdz6TAYDq9YloOJOFm4eht5524166LGGfW_5GRGU/edit?usp=sharing).

## Programming

-   This web application was built using [R programming language](https://cran.r-project.org) version `r getRversion()`

-   Web framework was built using R [Shiny package](https://shiny.rstudio.com).

-   Moodle quiz report was processed using R package [moodleQuiz](https://github.com/Lightbridge-AI/moodleQuiz) by its 4 main functions:

    -   **Check Submission:** `check_sub()`

    -   **Combine Responses:** `combine_resp()` and `count_resp()`

    -   **Combine Grades:** `combine_grades()`

-   Other data manipulation was performed using R meta-packages: [tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org).
